## add variable

Creates a new `Add` gen using given `step` (default: 1) and `start (default: 0) values, producing: `<!-- -->y(t) = step + y(t-1)<!-- -->\`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add: (step?: number | undefined, start?: number | undefined, clamp?: number | undefined) => Add
```
